text: Is there a package for loading `pkl` files in Julia? I saw there is a package NPZ.jl for loading `npz` files, but could not find one for `pkl` .

elements.text: Is there a package for loading
files in Julia? I saw there is a package NPZ.jl for loading
files, but could not find one for

text: You likely should use PyCall. From what I remember can contain effectively arbitrary python code, so you likely depend on an interpreter.

elements.text: You likely should use PyCall. From what I remember can contain effectively arbitrary python code, so you likely depend on an interpreter.

text: Also, you may be aware, but I wouldn't store anything you care about long term retrieval in pickles, they are not stable across version, etc. Better something stable and language independent, (Arrow, HDF5, Json, etc)

elements.text: Also, you may be aware, but I wouldn't store anything you care about long term retrieval in pickles, they are not stable across version, etc. Better something stable and language independent, (Arrow, HDF5, Json, etc)

text: Thanks for the response. Looks like the simplest way is too write a python script for pkl-to-npz converting. :nauseated_face:
